title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with eggs and cheese, and combine with cooked bacon.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and soy sauce.

title: Creamy Mushroom Chicken
instructions: Saute chicken and mushrooms, add cream, and simmer.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef with mushrooms, stir in sour cream, serve over pasta.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in soy sauce and garlic.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Grill salmon with lemon, garlic, and herbs.

title: Tuna Pasta Salad
instructions: Mix cooked pasta with tuna, mayo, and veggies.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef with beans and tomatoes. Add chili.

title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Boil lentils with vegetables and spices.

title: Baked Ziti
instructions: Layer pasta with meat sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

title: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Layer cooked beef and vegetables under mashed potatoes. Bake.

title: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with meat and rice mixture. Bake.

title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Make cheese sauce, mix with pasta, and bake.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Saute shrimp in garlic butter, serve over pasta.

title: Fajitas
instructions: Cook chicken with peppers and spices. Serve in tortillas.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with spices. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta and mix with Alfredo sauce and chicken.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Boil vegetables and beans. Add pasta and cook until tender.

title: Bulgur Salad
instructions: Mix cooked bulgur with chopped vegetables and lemon juice.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with sauteed vegetables.

title: Sloppy Joes
instructions: Cook beef with sauce and serve on buns.

title: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Blend chickpeas with spices, form patties, fry, and wrap.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken with sauce ingredients and veggies.

title: Gnocchi with Pesto
instructions: Boil gnocchi and mix with pesto sauce.

title: Pork Chops with Apples
instructions: Cook pork with apples and onion until tender.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Layer fried eggplant with sauce and cheese, then bake.

title: Quiche Lorraine
instructions: Fill crust with egg mixture and bake.

title: Turkey Meatballs
instructions: Form and bake meatballs, then simmer in sauce.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Layer and roast vegetables with herbs.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Fry tofu and mix with stir-fried vegetables and sauce.

title: Curry Chickpeas
instructions: Simmer chickpeas in coconut curry sauce.

title: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and fold in whipped cream. Chill until set.

title: Lemon Tart
instructions: Bake tart crust, then fill with lemon custard. Chill before serving.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
instructions: Layer biscuits with cream and strawberries. Serve chilled.

title: Banana Bread
instructions: Mix mashed bananas with batter. Bake until golden.

title: Apple Crisp
instructions: Top sliced apples with oat mixture. Bake until bubbly.

title: Vanilla Pudding
instructions: Cook milk with sugar and cornstarch. Add vanilla and cool.

title: Peach Cobbler
instructions: Layer peaches in pan and cover with batter. Bake until browned.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Layer coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone mix. Chill overnight.

title: Rice Pudding
instructions: Simmer rice in milk with sugar. Add cinnamon and serve warm or cold.

title: Coconut Macaroons
instructions: Mix ingredients, form into balls. Bake until golden.

title: Brownies
instructions: Mix and bake until center is just set. Cool before cutting.

title: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Pour filling into pie shell. Bake until center is firm.

title: Creme Brulee
instructions: Bake custard in water bath. Chill and torch sugar top.

title: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
instructions: Arrange fruit at bottom, pour batter on top. Bake and invert.

title: Molten Lava Cake
instructions: Bake until edges are set but center is gooey. Serve warm.

title: Panna Cotta
instructions: Heat cream with sugar and vanilla. Add gelatin and chill.

title: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: Fold berries into batter. Bake until golden.

title: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix shredded carrots with batter. Bake and frost if desired.

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
instructions: Mix and shape dough. Press with fork and bake.

title: Cheesecake
instructions: Pour filling into crust. Bake, then chill thoroughly.

title: Baklava
instructions: Layer phyllo with nuts and bake. Pour syrup on top.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients, drop dough on tray. Bake until golden.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop fruit, drizzle with honey. Garnish with mint.

title: Cinnamon Rolls
instructions: Roll dough with cinnamon filling. Bake and glaze.

title: Chocolate Truffles
instructions: Chill ganache, roll into balls. Dust with cocoa.

title: Bread Pudding
instructions: Soak bread in custard mix. Bake until set.

title: Profiteroles
instructions: Fill puffs with cream. Drizzle with chocolate.

title: Ice Cream Sandwiches
instructions: Scoop ice cream between cookies. Freeze until firm.

title: Eclairs
instructions: Pipe pastry, bake and fill with cream. Top with glaze.

title: Tres Leches Cake
instructions: Soak sponge cake with milk mixture. Chill and serve.
